Description: Very nice Prestige Heritage Burl Maple Guitar Beautiful Burl Maple Top Seymour Duncan P90s Gold Hardware Guitar is in really nice shape. Just some light wear scratches in the coating on the back mostly The back of the guitar is darker than the pictures show. The flash lightened it up Comes with cool Prestige basketweave hardcase. Unfortunately, the handle broke off. I will include it in case you can fix it or simply get a replacement handle or use as is Thinning out the herd More details from the internet below Please feel fee to ask questions or make offers Also listed locally Heritage Premier Series The Heritage Premier guitars showcase the evolution in our Heritage series solid body electrics. The “Premier Burl” features a unique single cutaway body design with a contoured back and crescent neck junction allowing better access to the top of the fingerboard and lessening the overall weight of the guitar. The Premier Burl features a solid carved 3/4″ AAA Burl Maple top, finished in natural gloss; allowing every inch of gorgeous wood grain to show through. The balance of the body and neck is solid Mahogany with ebony fingerboard, featuring mother of pearl and abalone fret inlays. Hardware includes all-gold TonePros locking bridge and 18:1 Grover Tuners.
